p: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Taking damage from enemy Champions or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.
q: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.
w: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction.
e: Neeko slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.
r: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air and gains a shield. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.

blurd: Hailing from a long lost tribe of vastaya, Neeko can blend into any crowd by borrowing the appearances of others, even absorbing something of their emotional state to tell friend from foe in an instant. No one is ever sure where—or who—Neeko might be...
name: Neeko
title: the Curious Chameleon
